item.title: CVE-2024-5052|2024-05-17T09:40:02.877Z -- cerberus%20ftp%20enterprise -- cerberus%20ftp%20enterprise
item.description: Denial of Service (DoS) vulnerability for Cerberus Enterprise 8.0.10.3 web administration. The vulnerability exists when the web server, default port 10001, attempts to process a large number of incomplete HTTP requests.
